text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump He gassed peaceful protesters
Is allowing discrimination against transgender 
Calls Nazis good people
Alienates allies and sucks up to dictators
Ignored experts on COVID-19 and 115,000+ dead, 2M+ sick
#PressSecretaryOfBullshit 
This day shall forever be
#HappyObamaDayJune14th https://t.co/UTM9JM1OdI
